item.title: Cracker Barrel loses almost $100 million in value after new logo release
item.description: Cracker Barrel stock plunged as much as 15% after the restaurant chain released a new logo that removes its long-time image of a man leaning against a...

item.title: 8/23: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Texas Republicans take victory lap after redistricting vote, Democrats vow to fight back; Minnesota hunting dog Bruno chases down foul balls

item.title: The Bugs Bunny Defense
item.description: Did a cartoon play a part in the death of a California man? "48 Hours" correspondent Richard Schlesinger reports.

item.title: The Fitbit Alibi
item.description: A suspect in a murder swears he didn’t do it – can his Fitbit prove he’s innocent? "48 Hours" correspondent Erin Moriarty reports.

item.title: 8/19: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: Many in Europe skeptical as Trump hints at deal with Putin; Reporter's Notebook: The death of "skibidi"?
